    • Method Detail

      • constrainedWith

        @Nonnull
public static <T> com.google.common.collect.Constraint<T> constrainedWith(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> predicate)
        Creates a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate. The Constraint will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the predicate returns false for the value passed to the Constraint
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to wrap
        Returns:
        a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if predicate is null

      • constrainedWith

        public static <T> com.google.common.collect.Constraint<T> constrainedWith(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> predicate,
                                                          String message)
        Creates a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate. The Constraint will throw an IllegalArgumentException containing the passed message if the predicate returns false for the value passed to the Constraint
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to wrap
        message - the message to include in any thrown exception
        Returns:
        a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if predicate or message is null

      • constrainedWith

        public static <T> com.google.common.collect.Constraint<T> constrainedWith(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> predicate,
                                                          com.google.common.base.Supplier<String> messageSupplier)
        Creates a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate. The Constraint will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the predicate returns false for the value passed to the Constraint
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to wrap
        messageSupplier - a supplier of the message to include in any thrown exception
        Returns:
        a Constraint wrapping the passed Predicate
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if predicate or messageSupplier is null
